title: What is the easiest way to learn how to play the mouth organ? - Quora

response.answer_text: Easiest way to learn mouth organ is .. Select easiest song and start to produce it through the reeds of mouth organ till you think  OR somebody recognises the song which you played ... But , in the beginning listen the original song minutely for more than hundred times ,so that you can produce it accurately .  Next three steps everybody knows  1...practice 2...practice 3...practice
